value.title: Certification programme in Deep Learning
value.excerpt: The Indian Institute of Science (IISc) and TalentSprint have launched a PG level Advanced Certification Programme in Deep Learning. The 10-month executive education programme will be taught by a team of inter-disciplinary faculty from IISc and TalentSprint through live and interactive online classes.

value.title: Oracle Database 21c spotlights in-memory processing and ML, adds new low-code APEX cloud service
value.excerpt: Because COVID drove customers to postpone upgrades last year, the latest annual update of Oracle database packs two years’ worth of new features. And it’s adding icing to the cake with a new low-code/no-code developer cloud service with a free tier to draw rookie developers.

value.title: Programming tweak helps AI software imitate human visual learning

value.title: IBM Leads in Quantum Computing, Ford in Driverless Car Patents
